statements: SELECT * FROM sales
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, revenue FROM sales
SELECT sale_id, revenue, sale_date FROM sales
SELECT sale_date, revenue FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY revenue
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC, revenue ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT sale_id, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales GROUP BY sale_id HAVING total_revenue > 10000
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, revenue FROM sales WHERE revenue > 5000 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue FROM sales
SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT sale_id, date, revenue FROM sales ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT sale_id, revenue FROM sales WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT date, total_revenue FROM daily_revenue_totals ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT sale_id, revenue FROM sales WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT date, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM sales GROUP BY date HAVING total_revenue > 5000;
SELECT date, total_revenue FROM daily_revenue_totals WHERE total_revenue BETWEEN 10000 AND 20000;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM daily_sales;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, sales_date, product_id, quantity, total_price FROM sales_transactions WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT sales_date, SUM(total_price) AS total_revenue FROM sales_transactions GROUP BY sales_date;
SELECT sales_date, product_name, quantity FROM sales_transactions JOIN products ON sales_transactions.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT sales_date, SUM(total_revenue) AS total_revenue FROM daily_sales GROUP BY sales_date ORDER BY sales_date DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT transaction_id, quantity, total_price FROM sales_transactions WHERE quantity >= 10 AND total_price > 100 ORDER BY transaction_id
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT sales_date, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_transactions GROUP BY sales_date HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY sales_date
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT sale_date, total_revenue FROM sales_summary ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales LIMIT 10;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT sale_date, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales GROUP BY sale_date HAVING total_sales > 1000;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY category, price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id = 3;
SELECT date, total_revenue FROM sales_summary_per_day WHERE total_revenue < 500 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-01-31'
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 1000
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1001
SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM products INNER JOIN categories ON products.category = categories.category_name GROUP BY category_name
